attributes.action: To make all except disabled go through UK border system including / especially MP's
attributes.additional_details:
Luckily I am partially disabled (Luckily!!!) we came to Gatwick in March and were told the wait to go thru passport controls was taking between an hour and 2 to get thru according to the security.
 I asked if it was OK for me to lay down and wait and then I was fast tracked.
  However, it seems MP's, Embassy staff, etc, also get "fast Tracked".
 This fast tracking should only be allowed for medical reasons.
 This would do 2 things, 1/ appraise MP's on the seriousness of waiting for 2+ hours, and 2/ sort the problem out.
 Basically, therefore, MP's etc should not get special attention at the expense of the rest of us.
